description: System-generated unique key for the financial period record; used for joins and internal identity, not business-meaningful.
Fiscal year the period belongs to.
Sequence number of the period within the fiscal year (typically 1â€“12 for months).
Optional human-readable label for the period (e.g., Jan 2023 or FY2023 P01).
Start date/time of the financial period (inclusive).
End date/time of the financial period; typically last moment of the period. Confirm inclusivity with SME.
Likely indicates the primary or active period or a display order; values are numeric rather than boolean; confirm intent and valid range with SME.
System timestamp of the most recent update from any source.
Timestamp of the most recent modification performed by a user; overlaps with user_date_modified; confirm authoritative field with SME.
User account that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User account that last modified the record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified.
